column1: The public/private partnership of #OperationWarpSpeed is proving to be a success in the fight against COVID. While these vaccines continue to work on approval continue to wear masks social distance wash hands and stay home if you are sick. https://t.co/XQrGE4stAY

Dems are telling Americans that the GOP support a tax code that favors the “rich”. False. We support low taxes for all. The Dem Covid-19 package they just voted for repeals the SALT deduction cap the GOP put in place in 2017. The result: a huge tax cut for the “rich”. Projecting?
@realDonaldTrump @FLOTUS prayers for a mild case of Covid-19 and a swift recovery.

We are physicians in Congress & we believe a science-driven safe & effective vaccine to COVID19 will be available in the near future. When it is available we encourage you to get vaccinated. #OperationWarpSpeed @DrPhilRoe @RepBradWenstrup @RepAndyHarrisMD https://t.co/HRntsBf6ox
#OperationWarpSpeed is about getting America back to normal by finding a safe effective vaccine to COVID-19. https://t.co/c1Q0sJhB5T

Let’s talk #OperationWarpSpeed. Members of the @gopdoccaucus are here to reassure you that the best and brightest scientists and doctors are working to deliver a safe and effective vaccine for COVID-19. https://t.co/mbOae59bBe

I applaud the @NIH for their commitment to deliver new COVID-19 testing technology. @RepDianaDegette & I have introduced legislation to advance testing. We must continue our work together to harness American ingenuity & federal resources to fight COVID-19.https://t.co/AO7tGi7n6h

We cannot slow the spread of COVID-19 if Americans have to continue to wait nearly 5 days to receive their test results. Bipartisan legislation that I have introduced with @RepDianaDeGette H.R. 7025 & 7026 will lead to faster results & increased capacity. https://t.co/EvonVUZLx5
Until an effective vaccine or therapeutic for COVID-19 is developed and widely available the key to limiting the spread of the virus is testing. https://t.co/eIUI2OgMOb

You are right @MickM2020 the next COVID relief package must include ways to increase our testing capacity. @RepDianaDeGette and I have bipartisan bills to help do just that https://t.co/vme7xLVtk5 https://t.co/EL2BR7d1ar

California Dems are releasing 8K prison inmates due to Covid 19 concerns. And now Dems and the media are losing their minds because @realDonaldTrump commuted Stone’s sentence which was the result of a politically motivated attack on the President? The hypocrisy is astounding.
This month’s #JobsReport shattered expectations and showed the resilience of our economy – despite the significant challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic.  https://t.co/xjB1HCgwR2

This afternoon I visited Chances and Services for Youth (CASY) Camp Rave summer program in Terre Haute. As parents return to work post Covid 19 Rave provides a safe and instructive program for kids to attend. https://t.co/myMDXavsEI

I have been working with the administration to provide needed supplies to help combat the coronavirus. As a physician I understand these supplies protect the lives and families of the health care professionals who are helping Hoosiers every day. https://t.co/YwjCMI3jlY

As a physician I understand the urgency doctors across the nation are feeling to help COVID 19 patients. It is important that Washington bureaucrats do not hinder their ability to find what works best.

While Speaker Pelosi has kept the House of Rep. from coming back to work she has crafted a Socialist wish list piece of legislation. Promoted as a Covid 19 stimulus bill in reality it is a Federal takeover of our economy and an anti-work bill. This will not become law.

The NFL released the 2020 schedule. Good to see them working to bring back football for fans to enjoy but more importantly putting in plans to ensure safety for those attending games & guarantees for ticket refunds if a game is cancelled due to COVID-19 https://t.co/K0PDP3s4SU
If you didn’t understand herd mentality and peer pressure before Covid 19 you should now.

For weeks the media/Dems criticized @realDonaldTrump saying he doesn’t have a “National” plan for Covid 19 (he does through CDC FDA NIH etc.) Now that he is developing an economic “reopening” plan they say he doesn’t have the authority to tell states what to do! Which is it?

My condolences to the family and friends of Terre Haute Firefighter John Schoffstall who passed away from Covid 19. First responders and healthcare workers are on the front lines in the fight against Covid 19. Help minimize their risk: follow the CDC and state guidelines.
The CARES Act provides much needed relief to Hoosier farmers with $9.5 billion for the U.S. Department of Agriculture to support agricultural producers impacted by COVID-19. https://t.co/F379FSql7x

The President’s Coronavirus Guidelines for America 15 Days to Slow the Spread. We can come together as a nation and take actions to protect ourselves and each other.  #coronavirus https://t.co/cpS31xZolZ
A message on #coronavirus #TipsFromDocCaucus. https://t.co/U0bg3ffkjg

It is important that the potential cost burden of diagnostic tests and eventual vaccine for #coronavirus do not hinder patients from seeking proper and preventative medical attention. @RepSchakowsky  https://t.co/j4qwWVqXjm https://t.co/r9tsYyH3JH
